item.title: Glances on SilverBlue after an update
item.description: Just updated from silverblue 34 to 35 with: rpm-ostree rebase fedora:fedora/35/x86_64/silverblue The update went very smooth, however there were a few minor caveats. My Fedora 34 toolbox was inop Had to add/update to a fedora 35 container created ansible script to make migration easier --- - hosts: localhost become: true gather_facts: false vars_files: - software.yml tasks: - name: Install software dnf: name: "{{ software }}" state: latest software.yml:
